instructions.title: Choose Your Room
instructions.description: Select from various room layouts including bedrooms, living rooms, kitchens, and magical garden spaces. Each room offers unique decorating opportunities.
instructions.tip: Start with a room that inspires you most!

instructions.title: Browse Furniture Catalog
instructions.description: Explore our extensive collection of kawaii furniture and decor items. From cozy beds to elegant sofas, find pieces that match your style.
instructions.tip: Take your time to find the perfect pieces for your space!

instructions.title: Drag & Drop Placement
instructions.description: Simply click and drag furniture items to place them in your room. The intuitive system makes decorating easy and enjoyable.
instructions.tip: Experiment with different arrangements to find the perfect layout!

instructions.title: Add Personal Touches
instructions.description: Enhance your space with magical decor items, plants, and accessories that reflect your personality and create the perfect atmosphere.
instructions.tip: Don't forget the small details that make a room feel complete!

instructions.title: Create Harmony
instructions.description: Arrange furniture and decor to create a harmonious and balanced space. Consider color coordination and room flow.
instructions.tip: Think about how you would move through the space in real life!

instructions.title: Save & Share
instructions.description: Save your beautiful creations and share them with friends. Each room you design becomes part of your personal portfolio.
instructions.tip: Take screenshots of your favorite designs to remember them!
